settings.testimonial: I have been taking Synchro Gold for the last 6 months, and I take it everyday. I sleep through the night, climb any mountain, run challenging courses. Today, I feel stronger than ever.
settings.name: Susan Riggio - Gold Liposomal Turmeric customer

settings.testimonial: “I love the sustained energy I feel. Genesis is not JUST a vegan protein - it is an entire meal replacement powerfood shake.”
settings.name: MaryAnn Elizebeth - Genesis customer

settings.testimonial: “Love this product. I've used it for a year and a half. Feel awesome, helped with joint pain and not one migraine! It’s really nice to find a company with high quality products with efficacy. Thanks!”
settings.name: Connie Graber - Gold Liposomal Turmeric customer

settings.nutrition_feature_description: The days of counting calories and fat are over. Here are the new keys to a lean, healthy, high-performing body and brain.
